channel.title: CVE Feed for Ashish Ajani -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ashish Ajani -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45067|2024-08-02T20:14:19.228Z -- ashish%20ajani -- wordpress%20simple%20html%20sitemap
item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Ashish Ajani WordPress Simple HTML Sitemap plugin <= 2.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-46627|2024-08-02T20:53:20.876Z -- ashish%20ajani -- wordpress%20simple%20html%20sitemap
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Ashish Ajani WordPress Simple HTML Sitemap plugin <= 2.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32574|2024-08-02T02:13:39.931Z -- ashish%20ajani -- wp%20simple%20html%20sitemap
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ashish Ajani WP Simple HTML Sitemap allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Simple HTML Sitemap: from n/a through 2.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32574|2024-06-04T17:50:19.619Z -- ashish%20ajani -- wp%20simple%20html%20sitemap
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ashish Ajani WP Simple HTML Sitemap allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Simple HTML Sitemap: from n/a through 2.8.
